column5: They were always my favourite spinnerbaits for musky. Can’t seem to find them anymore. Does anyone know where to get them?
https://www.amazon.ca/Lindy-Muskie-Tandem-Black-Chartreuse/dp/B003NCMYPQ/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=Lindy+M%2FG+Muskie+Tandem&qid=1645067833&sr=8-1 here's a start, unfortunately sold out everywhere
Where are you located?  I'm pretty sure I have a bunch unused in my basement. I'll check and post some photos. You can make an offer if you wish. Cheaper than $51.............
So far I have just found Lindy Big-Fin Spiinerbaits (10) and Lindy Little Joe Giant Tandem Spin (7). I'll need to dig a little deeper into my basement.  Here's an example of each .
Thx those aren’t the same baits though.
Yea I need to dig deeper into my storage crates. I think I have a couple.
I found 2 - Mepps style gold blade with a purple marabou tail (MT215) and Green/Orange/Chartreuse Tandem (MT113)
I’d love to have a peek in that basement. Well stocked. Any chance you’ve got a crate of spare Slopmaster spinnerbaits? Caught my first musky on one; will forever hold a special place in my heart.

Funny you should ask..... I do have a box full. What style/ color are you looking for? I'll take a photo or two tomorrow.  Ever come to Cleveland?  If the border gets back to normal, I may be able to send some back with one of my cousins in Toronto or Barrie.

Wow. That’s some basement. Think it was considered natural/nickel. Single Colorado blade. Mind you, I was only half way serious, I’d have to mortgage my house if I had to come up with enough cash to buy a box of musky baits at todays prices. I think the last time I bought one it was from Lebarons and was about 12 bucks. Thought it expensive then!
